21 
22 class LedRingCommander(object):
23  """
24  This class is in charge of the Led Ring Node
25  Its main goal is to interpret commands, and use methods from the LedRingCommander class according to this command
26  """
27 
28  def __init__(self):
29  rospy.loginfo("Led Ring Commander - Initialisation")
30  self.__is_shutdown = False
31  self.__is_simulation = rospy.get_param("~simulation_mode")
32 
33  self.led_ring_anim = LedRingAnimations()
34  self.robot_status = RobotStatus.BOOTING
35  self.robot_status_str = ""
36  self.logs_status = RobotStatus.NONE
37  self.robot_out_of_bounds = False
38  self.rpi_overheating = False
39 
40  self.user_animation_lock = threading.Lock()
41  self.led_ring_animation_thread = threading.Thread()
42 
43  self.error_animation_lock = threading.Lock()
44  self.led_ring_state = LedRingStatus()
45 
46  self.user_mode = False # True if controlled by user, False if displaying robot state (priority)
47  self.running_status_command = None
48 
49  self.dict_led_ring_methods = {
50  LedRingAnimation.NONE: self.none_animation,
51  LedRingAnimation.SOLID: self.solid_animation,
52  LedRingAnimation.ALTERNATE: self.alternate_animation,
53  LedRingAnimation.CHASE: self.chase_animation,
54  LedRingAnimation.FLASHING: self.flashing_animation,
55  LedRingAnimation.COLOR_WIPE: self.wipe_animation,
56  LedRingAnimation.RAINBOW: self.rainbow_animation,
57  LedRingAnimation.RAINBOW_CYLE: self.rainbow_cycle_animation,
58  LedRingAnimation.RAINBOW_CHASE: self.rainbow_chase_animation,
59  LedRingAnimation.GO_UP: self.go_up_animation,
60  LedRingAnimation.GO_UP_AND_DOWN: self.go_up_and_down_animation,
61  LedRingAnimation.BREATH: self.breath_animation,
62  LedRingAnimation.SNAKE: self.snake_animation,
63  LedRingAnimation.CUSTOM: self.custom_animation,
64  }
65 
66  # - Publishers
67  self.__led_ring_status_pub = rospy.Publisher('~led_ring_status', LedRingStatus, latch=True, queue_size=10)
68  rospy.sleep(1)
69  self._publish_led_ring_status() # publish the status at the beginning
70 
71  rospy.on_shutdown(self.shutdown)
72  self.display_user_mode() # Turn on the leds with the right animation
73 
74  # Define this object as an observer of led_ring_anim, so when an observable
75  # variable change, this node is informed.
76  # This is usefull for the current animation and the current color, which are
77  # managed by the led ring commander class.
78  self.led_ring_anim.register_observer(self)
79 
80  # - Services
81  self.__set_ring_led_user = rospy.Service('~set_user_animation', LedUser, self.__callback_set_led_ring_user)
82  self.__set_led_color_service = rospy.Service('~set_led_color', SetLedColor, self.__callback_set_led_color)
83  rospy.Service('~get_led_colors', GetLedColors, self.__callback_get_led_colors)
84 
85  # - Subscribers
86  self.robot_status_subscriber = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_status/robot_status',
87  RobotStatus,
88  self.__callback_robot_status,
89  queue_size=1)
90  rospy.Subscriber("/niryo_robot/blockly/save_current_point", Int32, self.__callback_save_current_point)
91  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_user_interface/niryo_studio_connection',
92  ConnectionState,
93  self.__callback_niryo_studio)
94  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/hotspot_button_state', HotspotButtonStatus, self.__callback_hotspot_button_state)
95 
96  self.__check_shutdown_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(2), self.shutdown_check)
97 
98  rospy.loginfo("Led Ring Commander - Started")
99 
100  def shutdown(self, color=None):
101  if not self.__is_shutdown:
102  self.__is_shutdown = True
103  self.robot_status_subscriber.unregister()
104  self.stop_led_ring_thread()
105  self.user_animation_lock.acquire()
106 
107  command = LedUserRequest()
108  command.colors = [WHITE]
109  command.iterations = 1
110  command.period = 2
111  self.breath_animation(command)
112 
113  self.blink(WHITE, 8, 0.5)
114  self.error_animation_lock.acquire()
115 
116  if color is None:
117  self.none_animation(None)
118  else:
119  self.led_ring_anim.solid(color)
120  time.sleep(0.5)
121  # self.__is_shutdown = True
122  rospy.signal_shutdown("shutdown")
123 
124  def shutdown_check(self, *_):
125  try:
126  if not rospy.is_shutdown() and not self.__is_shutdown:
127  rosnode.get_node_names()
128  except rosnode.ROSNodeIOException:
129  self.shutdown()
130 
131  @property
132  def is_shutdown(self):
133  return self.__is_shutdown
134 
135  # - Callbacks
136  def __callback_robot_status(self, msg):
137  """
138  Callback method to set led ring state according to current robot status.
139  This callback takes precedence over the user's led ring control method, if the
140  robot status is not RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS and logs status is not NONE.
141  It is triggered only when the robot status changed.
142  """
143  if msg.robot_status == RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN:
144  self.shutdown()
145  elif msg.robot_status in [RobotStatus.REBOOT, RobotStatus.UPDATE]:
146  self.shutdown(WHITE)
147  elif self.robot_status == RobotStatus.BOOTING != msg.robot_status:
148  rospy.sleep(3.5) # because no fade
149  if not self.__is_simulation:
150  from niryo_robot_led_ring.led_ring_utils import enable_led_ring
151  enable_led_ring(rospy.get_param('~enable_led_ring_bcm_pin'))
152  self.led_ring_anim.init_led_ring()
153  # self.led_ring_anim.fade(BLUE)
154 
155  new_robot_status = self.robot_status != msg.robot_status
156  new_robot_out_of_bound = self.robot_out_of_bounds != msg.out_of_bounds
157  new_rpi_overheating = self.rpi_overheating != msg.rpi_overheating
158 
159  if new_robot_status or new_robot_out_of_bound or new_rpi_overheating:
160 
161  if new_robot_status and msg.robot_status in [RobotStatus.CALIBRATION_IN_PROGRESS, RobotStatus.REBOOT_MOTOR]:
162  rospy.sleep(0.5) # for synchro
163  self.blink(YELLOW, 3, 1)
164 
165  self.robot_status = msg.robot_status
166  self.robot_status_str = msg.robot_status_str
167  self.logs_status = msg.logs_status
168  self.robot_out_of_bounds = msg.out_of_bounds
169  self.rpi_overheating = msg.rpi_overheating
170 
171  self.set_user_mode(
172  self.robot_status in [RobotStatus.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS, RobotStatus.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS])
173  self.display_user_mode()
174 
175  def __callback_set_led_ring_user(self, req):
176  """
177  Service to allow the user to control the Led Ring. A new request will interrupt the previous one, if still
178  playing.
179  """
180  if not self.user_mode:
181  # if the status of the robot is not RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS
182  return CommandStatus.ABORTED, "Led Ring not in autonomous mode, user can't control it"
183 
184  animation = req.animation_mode.animation
185 
186  rospy.logdebug('Led ring - controled by user, animation n. {}'.format(animation))
187  if animation in self.dict_led_ring_methods:
188  self.start_user_thread(req)
189 
190  animation_name = ROBOT_ANIM_TO_STRING[animation]
191  if req.wait_end and (req.iterations != 0 or animation == LedRingAnimation.COLOR_WIPE):
192  interrupted = self.wait_until_finished()
193  return self._return_after_waiting(animation_name, req.iterations, interrupted)
194  else:
195  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Led Ring set by user: {} mode launched".format(animation_name)
196  else:
197  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Led Ring set by user: command request doesn't exist"
198 
199  def __callback_set_led_color(self, req):
200  if not self.user_mode:
201  # if the status of the robot is not RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS
202  return CommandStatus.ABORTED, "Led Ring not in autonomous mode, user can't control it"
203 
204  if not (0 <= req.led_id < self.led_ring_anim.led_count):
205  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Wrong led id, must be between 0 and {}".format(
206  self.led_ring_anim.led_count - 1)
207 
208  self.led_ring_anim.set_led_color(req.led_id, req.color)
209 
210  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Successfully set led {} at color {}".format(
211  req.led_id, [req.color.r, req.color.g, req.color.b])
212 
213  def __callback_get_led_colors(self, _):
214  led_ring_colors = map(get_rgba_color_from_list, self.led_ring_anim.get_state_list_from_pixel_strip())
215  return GetLedColorsResponse(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS,
216  message='Successfully retrieved the leds colors',
217  led_ring_colors=list(led_ring_colors))
218 
219  def __callback_save_current_point(self, _msg):
220  if not self.user_mode:
221  self.blink_over_status(WHITE, 1, 0.5)
222 
223  def __callback_niryo_studio(self, msg):
224  if msg.state in [ConnectionState.connection, ConnectionState.close] and not self.user_mode:
225  self.blink_over_status(PURPLE, 2, 0.5)
226 
227  def __callback_hotspot_button_state(self, msg):
228  if msg.state == HotspotButtonStatus.RELEASED and msg.mode != HotspotButtonStatus.IGNORE_PRESS:
229  self.blink(BLUE, 2, 0)
230  self.display_user_mode()
231  elif msg.mode in [HotspotButtonStatus.LONG_PRESS, HotspotButtonStatus.VERY_LONG_PRESS]:
232  command = LedUserRequest()
233  command.animation_mode.animation = LedRingAnimation.FLASHING
234  command.colors = [PURPLE] if msg.mode == HotspotButtonStatus.VERY_LONG_PRESS else [WHITE]
235  self.start_led_ring_thread(command)
236  else:
237  self.display_user_mode()
238 
239  def notify_current_anim_and_color(self, _observer):
240  """
241  called by the led_ring_anim when the current animation played or the color on the Led Ring is updated,
242  used to publish Led STATUS
243  """
244  self._publish_led_ring_status()
245 
246  # - Threads
247  def start_user_thread(self, command):
248  self.stop_led_ring_thread()
249  self.led_ring_animation_thread = threading.Thread(target=self.user_animation, args=[command])
250  self.led_ring_animation_thread.start()
251 
252  def start_led_ring_thread(self, command):
253  """
254  Start a thread to allow the user to control the led.
255  We use a thread to avoid the blocking effect of the Led ring
256  control methods.
257  """
258  # print 'get lock'
259  # with self.error_animation_lock:
260  # pass
261  # print 'retrieve lock'
262  self.stop_led_ring_thread()
263  # print 'stopped thread'
264  self.led_ring_animation_thread = threading.Thread(
265  target=self.dict_led_ring_methods[command.animation_mode.animation], args=[command])
266  self.running_status_command = command
267  self.led_ring_animation_thread.start()
268  # print 'thread started'
269 
270  def stop_led_ring_thread(self):
271  try:
272  if self.led_ring_anim.is_animation_running():
273  self.led_ring_anim.stop_animation()
274 
275  while self.led_ring_animation_thread.join(timeout=0.1) is None and not rospy.is_shutdown():
276  self.led_ring_anim.stop_animation()
277  if not self.led_ring_animation_thread.is_alive():
278  return
279 
280  except (AttributeError, RuntimeError):
281  pass
282 
283  def error_animation(self):
284  self.blink_over_status(RED, 5, 2)
285 
286  def blink_over_status(self, color, iterations, period):
287  self.blink(color, iterations, period)
288  command = self.get_robot_status_led_ring_cmd()
289  self.start_led_ring_thread(command)
290 
291  # - Publisher
292 
293  def _publish_led_ring_status(self):
294  """
295  Publish the current status of the Led ring, as a LedRingStatus message :
296  led_mode: either controlled by user or displaying robot status
297  animation_mode: which method is used to animate pixels (solid, flashing,...), as a LedRingAnimation message
298  animation_color: current animation color, except for rainbow methods
299 
300  Function called only when one parameter changed.
301  """
302  # check if led mode or led animations changed
303 
304  led_ring_state = LedRingStatus()
305  led_ring_state.led_mode = LedRingStatus.USER if self.user_mode else LedRingStatus.ROBOT_STATUS
306  led_ring_state.animation_mode = LedRingAnimation()
307  led_ring_state.animation_mode.animation = self.led_ring_anim.current_animation
308  led_ring_state.animation_color = self.led_ring_anim.current_animation_color
309 
310  if led_ring_state != self.led_ring_state:
311  self.led_ring_state = led_ring_state
312  try:
313  self.__led_ring_status_pub.publish(led_ring_state)
314  except rospy.ROSException:
315  return
316 
317  # - Usefull methods
318  def wait_until_finished(self):
319  """
320  Wait until all iterations of the Led Ring method are done. After that, the led ring is turned off.
321  If function was interrupted, return True.
322  """
323  if self.led_ring_animation_thread.is_alive():
324  self.led_ring_animation_thread.join()
325  return self.led_ring_anim.was_function_interrupted()
326 
327  @staticmethod
328  def _return_after_waiting(anim_name, iterations, interrupted):
329  """
330  Return a CommandStatus and a message, after the requested animation was completed
331  """
332  if not interrupted:
333  if iterations is not None:
334  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Led Ring set by user: {} iterations done - ".format(
335  iterations) + anim_name + " mode"
336  else:
337  # iteration is 0 for color wipe and solid mode.
338  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Led Ring set by user: done - " + anim_name + " mode"
339  else:
340  return CommandStatus.STOPPED, "Led Ring set by user: interrupted - " + anim_name + " mode"
341 
342  def set_user_mode(self, boolean):
343  if boolean != self.user_mode:
344  self.user_mode = boolean
345  self._publish_led_ring_status()
346 
347  def display_user_mode(self):
348  if RobotStatus.BOOTING == self.robot_status:
349  return
350 
351  command = self.get_robot_status_led_ring_cmd()
352  if command == self.running_status_command or self.__is_shutdown:
353  return
354  elif self.user_animation_lock.locked() and self.robot_status in [
355  RobotStatus.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS, RobotStatus.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS
356  ]:
357  return
358 
359  self.start_led_ring_thread(command)
360 
361  def get_robot_status_led_ring_cmd(self):
362  # Prioritize Emergency Stop animation
363  if self.robot_status in ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM and self.robot_status in ROBOT_CRITICAL_STATUS:
364  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM[self.robot_status]
365  elif self.robot_out_of_bounds:
366  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM["out_of_bound"]
367  elif self.rpi_overheating:
368  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM["overheating"]
369  elif self.robot_status in ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM:
370  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM[self.robot_status]
371  else:
372  # If no method defined (no entry for this key in dictionnay), turn off led rings
373  rospy.logdebug('Led ring - No Led control method defined for {} status and {} log'.format(
374  self.robot_status, self.robot_status_str))
375  animation, colors = ROBOT_STATUS_TO_ANIM[RobotStatus.UNKNOWN]
376 
377  command = LedUserRequest()
378  command.animation_mode.animation = animation
379  command.colors = colors if isinstance(colors, list) else [colors]
380  return command
381 
382  # - Animations functions
383  def user_animation(self, cmd):
384  animation_id = cmd.animation_mode.animation
385  with self.user_animation_lock:
386  self.running_status_command = None
387  self.dict_led_ring_methods[animation_id](cmd)
388 
389  # Pour certaines animation, on laisse la couleur,
390  # pour les autre on affiche l'etat du robot a la fin de l'animation
391  if not self.led_ring_anim.was_function_interrupted() and animation_id not in [
392  LedRingAnimation.NONE,
393  LedRingAnimation.COLOR_WIPE,
394  LedRingAnimation.SOLID,
395  LedRingAnimation.CUSTOM,
396  ]:
397  robot_status_command = self.get_robot_status_led_ring_cmd()
398  self.running_status_command = robot_status_command
399  self.dict_led_ring_methods[robot_status_command.animation_mode.animation](robot_status_command)
400 
401  def none_animation(self, _cmd):
402  try:
403  self.led_ring_anim.none()
404  except AttributeError:
405  pass
406 
407  def solid_animation(self, cmd):
408  self.led_ring_anim.solid(cmd.colors[0])
409 
410  def alternate_animation(self, cmd):
411  self.led_ring_anim.alternate(cmd.colors, cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
412 
413  def chase_animation(self, cmd):
414  self.led_ring_anim.chase(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
415 
416  def flashing_animation(self, cmd):
417  self.led_ring_anim.flashing(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
418 
419  def wipe_animation(self, cmd):
420  self.led_ring_anim.color_wipe(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period)
421 
422  def rainbow_animation(self, cmd):
423  self.led_ring_anim.rainbow(cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
424 
425  def rainbow_cycle_animation(self, cmd):
426  self.led_ring_anim.rainbow_cycle(cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
427 
428  def rainbow_chase_animation(self, cmd):
429  self.led_ring_anim.rainbow_chase(cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
430 
431  def go_up_animation(self, cmd):
432  self.led_ring_anim.go_up(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
433 
434  def go_up_and_down_animation(self, cmd):
435  self.led_ring_anim.go_up_and_down(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
436 
437  def breath_animation(self, cmd):
438  self.led_ring_anim.breath(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
439 
440  def snake_animation(self, cmd):
441  self.led_ring_anim.snake(cmd.colors[0], cmd.period, cmd.iterations)
442 
443  def custom_animation(self, cmd):
444  self.led_ring_anim.custom(cmd.colors)
445 
446  def blink(self, color, iterations, period):
447  with self.error_animation_lock:
448 
449  command = LedUserRequest()
450  command.animation_mode.animation = LedRingAnimation.FLASHING
451  command.colors = [color]
452  command.iterations = iterations
453  command.period = period
454  self.start_led_ring_thread(command)
455  try:
456  if self.led_ring_animation_thread.is_alive():
457  self.led_ring_animation_thread.join()
458  except RuntimeError:
459  pass
